scripts.predist: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-mac-arm64: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=arm64 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --mac dmg --arm64
scripts.build-mac-x64: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=x64 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --mac dmg --x64
scripts.build-win-x64: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=x64 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --win nsis --x64
scripts.build-win-x86: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=x86 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --win nsis --x86
scripts.release-mac-arm64: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=arm64 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --mac dmg --arm64 --publish=always --config.extraMetadata.version=1.0.0-mac-arm64
scripts.release-mac-x64: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=x64 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --mac dmg --x64 --publish=always --config.extraMetadata.version=1.0.0-mac-x64
scripts.release-win-x64: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=x64 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --win nsis --x64 --publish=always --config.extraMetadata.version=1.0.0-win-x64
scripts.release-win-x86: cross-env TARGET_ARCH=x86 npm run prebuild-node && electron-builder --win nsis --x86 --publish=always --config.extraMetadata.version=1.0.0-win-x86
scripts.release-all: npm run release-mac-arm64 && npm run release-mac-x64 && npm run release-win-x64 && npm run release-win-x86
